reqs:
Pre-reqs: All of NURS 302, NURS 303, NURS 304, NURS 305, NURS 306.
Co-reqs: Either (a) all of NURS 338, NURS 339, NURS 340 or (b) all of NURS 341, NURS 342, NURS 343. (Depends on sequencing of NURS 336 with other professional practice courses.)
Equivalents:
courseName: Professional Nursing Practice with Communities and Populations
description: Analysis and application of theories and strategies for working in partnership with populations, health professionals, and community services providers. Students use primary health care principles and population health promotion approaches during community nursing practice.
